meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Special recognition of Mark Lampkin for his 24 years of service and dedication to the City and Park and Recreation Department

agenda_items.title: Quarterly Safety Update
agenda_items.description: Update on Safety in the Park System
agenda_items.presenter: M. Renee Johnson, Chief Rick Watson, Chief David Pughes

agenda_items.title: Service Price Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for the maintenance, repair and restoration of multi-sport court surfaces with Hellas Construction Inc. and GG Contractors, LLC.

agenda_items.title: Master Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of youth athletic gear, equipment and supplies for the Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Golf Operations Policy
agenda_items.description: Authorize the revision of Section C. Recognized Holidays of the Golf Course Operations Policy.

agenda_items.title: Martyr’s Park Historical Marker
agenda_items.description: Authorize the placement of the Jane Elkins Texas State Historical Marker at Martyr’s Park.

agenda_items.title: Forest Audelia
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Supplemental Agreement No. 1 for professional services for a multipurpose center and park.

agenda_items.title: Parkdale Lake Grant Application
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department Local Parks Urban Outdoor Grant Program.

agenda_items.title: Marcus Recreation Center Grant Application
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department Local Parks Urban Indoor Recreation Grant Program.

financial_items.description: Service price agreement for maintenance and repair of multi-sport court surfaces
Master agreement for youth athletic gear and supplies
Estimated revenue from Golf Operations Policy revision
Supplemental Agreement for multipurpose center and park
Grant application for Marcus Recreation Center
